mapper.update: update building set active=false where building_id=#{buildingId} and active=true
mapper.select: select B.building_id, B.building_name, B.floors, B.rooms, B.lives, B.create_time, B.active, D.dormitory_id, D.dormitory_number, D.totals, D.active from building B left join dormitory D on D.building_id=B.building_id and D.active=true where B.building_id=#{buildingId} and B.active=true
select building_id, building_name, floors, rooms, lives, create_time, active from building where active=true
